## IGraphAttachPoint.resizeCanvas() method

Synchronizes the canvas' actual size with the size set by attribute. Returns the updated size in both css and actual pixels.

Do not call directly, call resize on the chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resizeCanvas(): ICanvasDimensions;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[ICanvasDimensions](./core.icanvasdimensions.md)
